content.question: In the second paragraph, the author draws on evidence from her personal experience primarily to

choices.label: explain a change in her assessment of a particular idea
affirm the value of striving to live up to a particular ideal
express regret for having compromised her integrity
establish a key distinction between her work ethic and that of Obamaâ€™s

content.answer: explain a change in her assessment of a particular idea

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
